description: This is a shell script used for self-healing network connectivity, including functions for ping tests, DNS resolution, resetting the router, and executing corrective actions based on network status.

methods.name: getCorrectiveActionState
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the corrective action setting from syscfg.

methods.name: calcRandTimetoStartPing
methods.description: Calculates a random delay in seconds to start the ping test.

methods.name: resetRouter
methods.description: Reboots the router by setting a reboot command via dmcli simulation.

methods.name: resetNeeded
methods.description: Triggers a router reset if the process name is PING.

methods.name: runDNSPingTest
methods.description: Performs DNS resolution tests and takes corrective actions if resolution fails.

methods.name: runPingTest
methods.description: Performs ICMP ping tests to the default gateway and triggers reset if ping fails.
